replies.bodyText: Most likely not, seems like a leftover method from the beginning. Going to remove it also, thanks

timeline.bodyText: I dont think we need '...' in LOGGER
timeline.author: doktoric

replies.bodyText:
Hehe okey. It’s just a “my kind of” informal stuff, usually I add this triple dot in the logs where something is about to happen which could take a while.
But hae it y'r way :)
